summary: A test suite that validates the behavior of various TTS feature processing components, including scalar handling, log compression with optional clamping, mean‑variance normalization (both standard and masked), and speaker‑specific normalization (standard and masked). It also provides a helper for generating test data dictionaries.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of audio feature preprocessing steps in text‑to‑speech pipelines, thereby supporting high‑quality speech synthesis and reducing regression risks.
